Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Offering a 30,500 SF three-story office building available for lease at 1010 Wethersfield Avenue, Hartford, CT.

The building features new LED lighting, newly renovated common areas, on-site management, 24-7 security system with closed circuit cameras. It is situated in a great location near highway access with free abundant covered and surface parking.

Available Space:
−
First Floor: 8,000 SF
−
Second Floor: 4,500 SF
−
Third Floor: 2,000 SF

Property Management: On-site

Lease Rate: $19.00/SF full-service gross

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: For lease approximately 2,700 SF of office space on the second floor at 150 Trumbull Street. The subject space is located directly above Trumbull Kitchen in the heart of downtown Hartford. The property provides excellent access to Interstates 84 and 91 and Route 2. It is also within walking distance to Bushnell Park, restaurants and banks.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 3 parking spaces per 1,000 SF leased (expandable) plus 25 visitor designated spaces
On-site security guard and Sonitrol security system

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Well-located just outside of Hartford's Central Business District, 999 Asylum Avenue provides convenient access to Interstates 84 & 91 and the Capitol. 999 Asylum Avenue is one of the best priced leasing opportunities available in the City of Hartford with ownership that truly cares about creating a comfortable working environment for its tenants.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Leasing opportunity available in the City of Hartford
